Description: This registry defines the license status and error messages.
@Redfish.License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 License.  For full text see link: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

ArgDescriptions: The reason for the license installation failure.
InstallFailed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the service failed to install the license.
InstallFailed.Description: Indicates that the service failed to install the license.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the reason for the license installation failure.
InstallFailed.Message: Failed to install the license.  Reason: %1.

ArgDescriptions: The number day of grace period.
GracePeriod.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a license has expired and entered its grace period.
GracePeriod.Description: Indicates that a license has expired and entered its grace period.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the human readable identifier of the license.
This argument shall contain the number day of grace period for the licensed functionality.
GracePeriod.Message: The license '%1' has expired, %2 day grace period before licensed functionality is disabled.

TargetsRequired.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that one or more targets need to be specified with the license.
TargetsRequired.Resolution: Add `AuthorizedDevices` to `Links` and resubmit the request.
TargetsRequired.Description: Indicates that one or more targets need to be specified with the license.
TargetsRequired.Message: The license requires targets to be specified.

Expired.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a license has expired and its functionality has been disabled.
Expired.Description: Indicates that a license has expired and its functionality has been disabled.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the human readable identifier of the license.

LicenseInstalled.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a license has been installed.  Existing licenses may have been updated or otherwise affected by the installation.
LicenseInstalled.Description: Indicates that a license has been installed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the human readable identifier of the license.

InvalidLicense.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the content of the license was not recognized, is corrupted, or is invalid.
InvalidLicense.Resolution: Verify the license content is correct and resubmit the request.
InvalidLicense.Description: Indicates that the license was not recognized, is corrupted, or is invalid.
InvalidLicense.Message: The content of the license was not recognized, is corrupted, or is invalid.

NotApplicableToTarget.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the license is not applicable to the target.
NotApplicableToTarget.Resolution: Check the license compatibility or applicability to the specified target.
NotApplicableToTarget.Description: Indicates that the license is not applicable to the target.
NotApplicableToTarget.Message: The license is not applicable to the target.

ArgDescriptions: The number of days before the license expires.
DaysBeforeExpiration.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate the number of days remaining on a license before expiration.
DaysBeforeExpiration.Description: Indicates the number of days remaining on a license before expiration.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the human readable identifier of the license.
This argument shall contain the number of days before the license expires.
DaysBeforeExpiration.Message: The license '%1' will expire in %2 days.

Name: License Message Registry
